definition: alcohol/wine with high alcohol content/rich/pure/good wine/sterols
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: You need to savour this wine to get its full flavor.
sentences.chinese: 要想充分体验这种酒的醇美，你需要慢慢地去品尝。

sentences.english: Taste your lips of wine anytime night or day.
sentences.chinese: 同时品尝你的醉人醇美的嘴唇，在任何时候。

sentences.english: You need to savour this wine to get its full flavour.
sentences.chinese: 要想充分体验这种酒的醇美，你需要慢慢地去品尝。

sentences.english: He feels her and then resemble the whisky of Ireland, thick joss-stick but superb.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得她就像爱尔兰威士忌一样，浓香而醇美。

sentences.english: The effect of separation is better for alcoholic isomeride.
sentences.chinese: 比如对醇美，尤其是对醇类异构体的分离效果更佳。

sentences.english: Notes of chocolate and ripe fruits give a fine, gourmet flavor in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力及成熟水果香气令其口味十分醇美。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
leaving a rich aftertaste/(fig.) memorable/lingering in memory
